Earl's Court, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Contest run in conjunction with contest on 28th May, 11th June,. Restricted to bands from Staffs, Derby, Cheshire, Salop and Nottingham. Prizes: £35, £20, £12, £8. 6 bands competed.
May 5, 2012, 3:19 p.m. March 22, 2020, 8:18 p.m.
